description:
Web design can seem a daunting challenge for entrepreneurs and small business owners. However, never before has setting up a business website been easier or more effective than is true with the Wordpress Content Management System.

This web design basics course is for students desiring to build their own website/blog quickly, effectively, and with brand presentation in mind.

In this course, we cover the following easy-to-understand development areas;

  1. How to quickly set-up a 5 page business website
  2. How to easily navigate back office management functions for beginners
  3. How to design a stunning website in 11 easy steps
  4. Quickly adding blog post content to increase website visits
  5. How to get and keep readers on your website
  6. Key areas which immediately increase visibility and website profits
  7. How to add videos, images, banners and other sales rich content

We take beginners, step-by-step, through the basics of setting up a business ready, e-commerce driven website so join us today!
title: Web Design
